description: 5*F(n)^2+3*(-1)^n where F(n) are the Fibonacci numbers A000045.
comments: Form the matrix A=[1,1,1;2,1,0;1,0,0]. a(n)=trace(A^n). - _Paul Barry_, Sep 22 2004The set of prime divisors of elements of this sequence with the exception of 3 is the set of primes that do not divide odd Fibonacci numbers. - _Tanya Khovanova_, May 19 2008
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,2,-1).
crossrefs: Cf. A133247 = prime numbers p with property that no odd Fibonacci number is divisible by p.
